body:
Introducing a new podcast that is hosted by {tag=bff56e079469477281be84fc627ea113}, {tag=c58188cb25d84d4497b111a598917f1b} and {tag=0af038412894434ca4be965b317244e8}.
In this podcast we talk about Avicus related topics and random stuff and talk about what we are up to in The Chil Cabin for an hour or so and upload it to my Channel for your entertainment.

A part of the podcast is the community interaction section of our podcast.
We will take your topics [Avicus and Random related] and your questions and talk and discuss them on the podcast (within reason).
Want to suggest a topic or ask a question for our podcast? You can ask/suggest here.
body_tagged:

In this podcast we talk about Avicus related topics and random stuff and talk about what we are up to in The Chil Cabin for an hour or so and upload it to my Channel for your entertainment.

A part of the podcast is the community interaction section of our podcast.
We will take your topics [Avicus and Random related] and your questions and talk and discuss them on the podcast (within reason).
Want to suggest a topic or ask a question for our podcast? You can ask/suggest here.
